title: The Omega
description: When the fairies of Pine Lake, a small enchanted town in Washington State, use a significant magical spell to keep Lexi alive, they are faced with unforeseen outcomes. The inhabitants suffer the most brutal consequences that come along with powerful blood magic. As the risk of the magic begins to unfold, the residents face a crisis as cunning enemies appear in the night, killing and wreaking havoc while trying to tear the community apart.After being broken apart by distance and circumstance, Lexi and Alexander must do everything in their power to save their home and everything they love. With everyone and everything they care about on the line, can Lexi and Alexander protect their magical hometown?The Omega is the third and final novel in this enchanting supernatural series. Be sure to read the first book "Warrior" and the second book "Supremacy" in the Superhumans' series.
author: Kelsey Schaeffer
